fixes.name: Min - Max Profit
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR currentProfit = SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])
VAR windowMax = MAXX(VALUES('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]), CALCULATE(SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])))
VAR windowMin = MINX(VALUES('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]), CALCULATE(SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])))
RETURN
IF(
    currentProfit = windowMax || currentProfit = windowMin,
    currentProfit,
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted SUM([Profit]) to SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]). Emulated WINDOW_MAX(SUM([Profit])) and WINDOW_MIN(SUM([Profit])) using MAXX/MINX over VALUES('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) with CALCULATE(SUM(...)) to reproduce the windowed comparison, then return the current sum when it equals the window max or min; otherwise BLANK().
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregation (SUM) and table calculations (WINDOW_MAX / WINDOW_MIN), so it must be implemented as a measure.
